sec.p:
We used the global GRACE solution CSR release RL-05. Our regional GRACE analysis used the methodology of ref. 3. Our GPS data processing followed that of ref. 6, as did our approach to time series analysis, both for GRACE and GNET. We characterized SMB in Greenland using the regional climate models MAR ( 15) and RACMO2 ( 5). Further details, and a discussion of data access, can be found in
SI Appendix .
